Name: countyfp
Description: County level FIPS (Federal Information Processing System) code. Unique for each American county.

Name: county_name
Description: Name of the county

Name: state
Description: state the county is located in

Name: pct_mask
Description: An aggregate variable representing the probability that a randomly selected person in a county will wear a mask. Calculated by 1*(always) + 0.75*(frequently)+0.5*(sometimes)+0.25*(rarely)+0*(never)

Name: always
Description: Percentage of people  who answered they "always" wear a mask

Name: frequently
Description: Percentage of peoplewho answered they frequently wear a mask

Name: sometimes
Description: Percentage of people  who answered they sometimes wear a mask

Name: rarely
Description: Percentage of peoplewho answered they rarely wear a mask

Name: never
Description: Percentage of people who answered they never wear a mask

Name: cases_02
Description: Number of COVID-19 cases on 07/02/2020

Name: deaths_02
Description: Number of COVID-19 deaths on 07/02/2020

Name: cases_14
Description: Number of COVID-19 cases on 07/14/2020

Name: deaths_14
Description: Number of COVID-19 deaths  on 07/14/2020

Name: cases_27
Description: Number of COVID-19 cases on 07/27/2020

Name: deaths_27
Description: Number of COVID-19 deaths  on 07/27/2020

Name: case_growth_1
Description: cases_14/cases_02

Name: case_growth_2
Description: cases_27/cases_14

Name: pop_2019
Description: Population estimate in 2019

Name: ru_continuum
Description: 1 to 10 rating on the Rural-Urban Continuum

Name: density
Description: Population density of the county

Name: pct_less_than_hs
Description: Percent of adults with less than a high school diploma, 2014-18

Name: pct_hs
Description: Percent of adults with a high school diploma only, 2014-18

Name: pct_some_college
Description: Percent of adults completing some college or associate's degree, 2014-18

Name: pct_college
Description: Percent of adults with a bachelor's degree or higher, 2014-18

Name: pct_poverty
Description: Percentage of people estimated to be living in poverty in 2018
Source: U.S. Census Bureau, Small Area Income and Poverty Estimates (SAIPE) Program

Name: pct_female
Description: Percentage of females in county, 2019

Name: pct_black
Description: Percentage of Black/African-American residents in county, 2019

Name: pct_native
Description: Percentage of American Indian or Alaskan Native people in county, 2019

Name: pct_hispanic
Description: Percentage of Hispanic people in county, 2019

Name: pct_seniors
Description: Percentage of adults 65 or over in county, 2019

Name: pct_trump_2016
Description: Percentage of county who voted for Donald Trump in 2016

Name: pct_trump_2020
Description: Percentage of county who voted for Donald Trump in 2020
Source: Scraped by GitHub user tonmcg from Fox News, Politico, and New York Times

Name: dem_governor
Description: Dummy variable coded 1 if the state has a Democratic governor

Name: state_mandate
Description: Dummy variable coded 1 if a statewide mask mandate was enacted before 07/14/2020

Name: county_mandate
Description: Dummy variable coded 1 if there was a county-wide mask mandate enacted before -7/14/2020
